short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension that adds useful features to Etherscan for traders. By @0xAgony

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension expands the functionality of etherscan.io, adding new useful features to it that enhance the experience for traders and enthusiasts alike.
